ygData.subject: Now any Guild suggestions
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks to all you higher lvl bards for your imput regarding Will the Bard get Better  I m not as frustrated now because I VE LVLED, hehe.  You guys were
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks to all you higher lvl bards for your imput regarding "Will the Bard get Better" I'm not as frustrated now because I"VE LVLED, hehe. You guys were right after lvl 17 things do move faster. The tips on getting a lighter faster weapon has been a lifesaver. I hated it but i traded in my mino axe. (hehe, i liked so much seeing that 17 points of damage scroll across the screen) However in the long run the change has paid off. Thanks Again for all your help..

Now i have another question. I'm interested in joining a good guild, emphasis on the good. A bard guild would be nice or a guild that is very active on my server, which is by the way Innoruk. Any suggestions would be appreciated.

Thanks Again

Sing it Loud and Proud Bards

Humility LVL 17 (HURRY) Innorruk
